name: Ex Nihilo (Lazy Cat)
description:
Free the land from the evil dictator. Someone has to, right? 

Features

  • Procedurally generated enemies
  • Lots of upgrades
  • Lots of items
  • Challenging combat

Minimum requirements

BrowserGoogle Chrome, version 70+Graphics CardNvidia GTX 600 or equivalentMemory4GB

Made by a lazy cat for your pleasure, with the help of friend cats.

The game is under active development, so please leave your feedback!
